parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the account that contains the VPC connection that you want to update.

parameters.name: VPCConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC connection that you're updating. This ID is a unique identifier for each Amazon Web Services Region in an Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The display name for the VPC connection.

parameters.name: SubnetIds
parameters.description: A list of subnet IDs for the VPC connection. (string) ---

parameters.name: SecurityGroupIds
parameters.description: A list of security group IDs for the VPC connection. (string) ---

parameters.name: DnsResolvers
parameters.description: A list of IP addresses of DNS resolver endpoints for the VPC connection. (string) ---

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: An IAM role associated with the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: VPCConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC connection that you are updating. This ID is a unique identifier for each Amazon Web Services Region in anAmazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: UpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The update status of the VPC connection's last update.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityStatus
nested_items.description: The availability status of the VPC connection.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
